name: Dice Showdown at the Space Casino
name_original: Dice Showdown at the Space Casino
description:
Welcome to the Casina Los Geevas - the hottest, coolest casino hosting the most high stakes HoverDice tournament this side of the sector!

Beat four contestants in HoverDice battles, take their special dice for your own, and climb to the top*!

Controls: Just use the mouse to click/tap on the screen to play!

Here's how the phases of a HoverDice battle works:

1. Setup - Choose your special dice to show up during the shooting phase

2. Shoot - Dice are tossed into the air and it's a free for all between you and your opponent to shoot the dice and claim as many as you can for yourself

3. Assign - Strategically assign dice to attack or defend with

4. Battle - Clash with your opponent to deal damage to them and come one step closer to victory!

*You will be stuck at the top sorry.

------------------------------------------------------------

Hi folks! Thanks for checking out our game, it's a bit unpolished so here's some important info that we didn't have time to put into the game.

Special dice don't have very good feedback when they occur, apologies for that. Here's some descriptions of how the effects work.

  • Weighted Dice - Rolls a 6 for its owner and a 1 for the opponent
  • Double Edged Dice - Rolls itself and nearby dice and permanently claims them for the contestant who didn't shoot it
  • Fake Dice - Tricksy dice that disappear when shot, wasting time
  • Time Stop Dice - Stops time, freezing the other contestant and giving the shooter more time to claim dice
